snippet: An American was arrested Tuesday night on a river that borders North Korea, the South Korean news media reported on Wednesday.
abstract: American man is arrested by South Korean authorities after attempting to swim to North Korea.
lead_paragraph: An American was arrested Tuesday night on a river that borders North Korea, the South Korean news media reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: South Korea: American Fails in Effort to Swim to North
headline.print_headline: South Korea: American Fails in Effort to Swim to North
